stepTitle: Consider the concept of limiting Reactant with regard to a chemical process, the reaction of hydrogen with chlorine to yield hydrogen chloride: $$H_2$$ $$(g)$$ + $$Cl_2$$ $$⟶$$ $$2HCl$$ $$(g).$$ Imagine combining $$3$$ Moles of $$H_2$$ and $$2$$ Moles of $$Cl_2$$. What's the limiting Reactant here?
